author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-1368: onRedelivery now support per exception clause, instead of only global. Using CamelCase for some header keys.

author: skitching
msg: Remove calls to "new ConversationManager", instead using the FactoryFinder and ConversationManagerFactory classes.
This allows better configurability of Orchestra by users, and easier unit testing.

author: cziegeler
msg: SLING-865 : Adjust reactor pom and svn information in each module.

author: skitching
msg: Fix ORCHESTRA-34 : NullPointerException on timeout of ConversationContext. The ConversationWiperThread does not run inside a request, and therefore had no FrameworkAdapter, but removeAndInvalidateConversationContext tries to check the conversationContext query param. Fix this by setting up a LocalFrameworkAdapter instance for the ConversationWiperThread.
